text:
The "República" is a national daily newspaper in Nepal. Nepal Republic Media Pvt. Ltd. in Kathmandu is the publisher. It started with an online edition on January 1, 2009 and the print edition on April 24, 2009. The "República" is a partner with the "Nagarik," a similar daily paper written in Nepali.
Overview.
Ameet Dhakal was the first editor in chief of the newspape. He quit in April 2012. Kosmos Biswakarma was the next editor. Subhash Ghimire became editor in chief in October 2014. He was 28 years old. The Gyawali family owns the newspaper. They also helped start Nepal's Kantipur Publications.
